title: Lee Kyu-chul
text:
Lee Kyu-Chul (born May 1, 1982) is a South Korean <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> player.
He has formerly played for <a href="K-League">K-League</a> sides <a href="Gwangju%20Sangmu">Gwangju Sangmu</a>, <a href="Daejeon%20Citizen">Daejeon Citizen</a> and <a href="Korea%20National%20League">Korea National League</a> side <a href="Yongin%20City%20FC">Yongin City FC</a>.
Career statistics.
"As of end of <a href="K-League%202008">2008</a> season"
